import React, { Component } from 'react'; import YouTube from 'react-youtube'; import {bindActionCreators} from 'redux' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import * as AppActions from '../../actions/movie' import CircularProgressbar from 'react-circular-progressbar'; class MovieDetail extends Component { componentDidMount(){ let ID = this.props.match.params.Id.split('-'); let url = `https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/${ID[0]}?api_key=5934c9098581e262e81b72718dbc9b0a&language=en-US`; this.props.actions.loadDetailMovie(url); } render(){ console.log(this.props.movie.genres); // const genre = this.props.movie.genres.map((items) => { // return( // {items.name} // ) // }) const { title, overview, release_date, vote_average, backdrop_path, original_title, poster_path, tagline, runtime, revenue} = this.props.movie; const opts = { height: '360', width: '100%', playerVars: { // https://developers.google.com/youtube/player_parameters autoplay: 0 } }; return(

) } _onReady(event) { event.target.pauseVideo(); } } function mapStateToProps(state){ return{ movie: state.movie } } function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){ return{ actions: bindActionCreators(AppActions, dispatch) } } export default connect( mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps )(MovieDetail)
